expo.name: EteSync
expo.description: Secure, end-to-end encrypted, and privacy respecting sync for your contacts, calendars and tasks.

infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Access to your contacts is needed in order to load and save EteSync contacts.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Access to your calendars is needed in order to load and save EteSync calendars.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Access to your reminders is needed in order to load and save EteSync reminders.
